contacts.description: Stores information about individual contacts within the CRM system, including personal details and relationship to companies.

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table

created_date.description: Date and time when the contact was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the contact was last updated

owner_id.description: User ID of the CRM user who owns or manages this contact

status.description: Current status of the contact (active, inactive, lead, etc.)

companies.description: Stores information about organizations that are customers, prospects, or partners within the CRM system.

industry.description: Industry or sector the company operates in

city.description: City where the company is located

state_province.description: State or province where the company is located

postal_code.description: Postal code where the company is located

country.description: Country where the company is located

phone.description: Main phone number for the company

employee_count.description: Number of employees at the company

created_date.description: Date and time when the company record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the company record was last updated

owner_id.description: User ID of the CRM user who owns or manages this company account

deals.description: Stores information about sales opportunities or deals being tracked in the CRM system.

name.description: Name or title of the deal

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table

primary_contact_id.description: Foreign key to the primary contact for this deal

stage_id.description: Foreign key to the pipeline stages table

owner_id.description: User ID of the CRM user who owns or manages this deal

probability.description: Likelihood of winning the deal as a percentage

expected_close_date.description: Expected date when the deal will close

created_date.description: Date and time when the deal was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the deal was last updated

source.description: Source of the deal (referral, website, cold call, etc.)

activities.description: Stores information about different types of activities (calls, emails, meetings, tasks) related to contacts, companies, or deals.

type.description: Type of activity (call, email, meeting, task)

subject.description: Subject or title of the activity

scheduled_date.description: Date and time when the activity is scheduled

duration.description: Duration of the activity in minutes

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table

deal_id.description: Foreign key to the deals table

owner_id.description: User ID of the CRM user who owns or manages this activity

created_date.description: Date and time when the activity was created

completed_date.description: Date and time when the activity was completed

roles.description: Stores information about user roles and their permissions within the CRM system.

created_date.description: Date and time when the role was created

users.description: Stores information about CRM users who can log in and use the system.

email.description: User's email address, used for login

role_id.description: Foreign key to the roles table

last_login_date.description: Date and time of the user's last login

created_date.description: Date and time when the user account was created

status.description: Status of the user account (active, inactive)

pipelines.description: Stores information about sales pipelines used to track deals through different stages.

created_date.description: Date and time when the pipeline was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the pipeline was last updated

pipeline_stages.description: Stores information about the stages in a sales pipeline.

stage_id.description: Unique identifier for each pipeline stage

description.description: Detailed description of the pipeline stage

display_order.description: Order in which the stage appears in the pipeline

probability.description: Default probability percentage for deals in this stage

pipeline_id.description: Foreign key to the pipelines table

products.description: Stores information about products and services that can be sold to customers through deals.

is_active.description: Whether the product is active and available for sale

created_date.description: Date and time when the product was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the product was last updated

deal_products.description: Junction table that associates products with deals, allowing multiple products to be added to a single deal with specific quantities and prices.

deal_product_id.description: Unique identifier for each deal-product association

deal_id.description: Foreign key to the deals table

product_id.description: Foreign key to the products table

quantity.description: Quantity of the product in the deal

price.description: Price of the product for this specific deal (may differ from standard price)

discount.description: Discount applied to the product in this deal (percentage)

notes.description: Stores text notes that users can add to contacts, companies, or deals to track important information and interactions.

content.description: The text content of the note

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table if the note is related to a contact

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table if the note is related to a company

deal_id.description: Foreign key to the deals table if the note is related to a deal

created_by.description: Foreign key to the users table indicating who created the note

created_date.description: Date and time when the note was created

documents.description: Stores information about files and documents that can be attached to contacts, companies, or deals.

name.description: Name or title of the document

file_path.description: Path to the file on the server or storage system

file_type.description: MIME type or extension of the file

file_size.description: Size of the file in bytes

uploaded_by.description: Foreign key to the users table indicating who uploaded the document

upload_date.description: Date and time when the document was uploaded

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table if the document is related to a contact

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table if the document is related to a company

deal_id.description: Foreign key to the deals table if the document is related to a deal

email_templates.description: Stores reusable email templates that users can use to send standardized communications to contacts.

template_id.description: Unique identifier for each email template

name.description: Name or title of the email template

subject.description: Subject line of the email template

body.description: HTML or text content of the email template

created_by.description: Foreign key to the users table indicating who created the template

created_date.description: Date and time when the template was created

last_modified_date.description: Date and time when the template was last modified

is_active.description: Whether the template is active and available for use
